mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental ( rental_id, user_id, product_id, payment_id, rental_status, rental_date, return_date, count ) VALUES ( #{rental_id}, #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{payment_id}, #{rental_status}, #{rental_date}, #{return_date}, #{count} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, f.facility_name, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.size, r.rental_date, r.return_date, r.rental_status, r.rental_id, r.count FROM rental r INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = r.user_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = r.product_id INNER JOIN facility f ON f.facility_id = p.facility_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
